House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03859
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING AUGUST 12 OF EVERY YEAR AS THE NATIONAL YOUTH DAY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AGABAS, TYRONE D.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-13
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2019-11-13
          -The body agreed to consolidate HB Nos. 323 and 3859, and to include the recommendations of the National Youth Commission in drafting the substitute bill.
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2019-12-17
          -Consideration and approval of Substitute Bill (HB Nos. 323 and 3859) and Committee Report of Measures which seek to declare August 12 of Every Year and the National Youth Day.
      3. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2019-12-18
      4. Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2020-03-02
          -Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2020-03-02
      5. Committee Report filed on 2020-03-03
      6. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2020-03-04
      7. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-03-10
      8. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-03-10
          -Approved on Second Reading
      9. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-03-10
          -Printed copies of the Committee Report No. 00262 on HB No. 6456 (in substitution of HB Numbered 323 & 3859) distributed to members
      10. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-06-01
          -Approved on Third Reading
